mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, NAME, VERSION, IMPORTANCE, PATH,DESCRIPTION,ENABLE
mapper.insert: insert into apk (USER_ID, NAME, VERSION, IMPORTANCE, PATH, DESCRIPTION, ENABLE) values (#{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update apk set USER_ID = #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORTANCE = #{importance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLE = #{enable,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
